content.value:
The AI Author Assistant is a generative Artificial Intelligence (AI) tool built-in for metR. This AI-based tool is powered by Llama and DeepSeek LLMs. The goal of this assistant is to help you analyze the open file and provide detailed suggestions to improve DITA element usage, content organization, topic classification, grammar, and formatting.

When you complete editing the selected file, you can click AI Suggestions icon from the Toolbar. Choose between Llama or DeepSeek and click the AI Suggestions again.

The AI Author Assistant will display the following sections with the suggestion or feedback on what can be improved in your DITA content.
